thread.title: Hezbollah bombed the city of Safed with 80 rockets » Iraqi News Agency
thread.title_full: Hezbollah bombed the city of Safed with 80 rockets » Iraqi News Agency

author: @ina__news
title: Hezbollah bombed the city of Safed with 80 rockets » Iraqi News Agency
text: Follow-up - INA The Islamic Resistance in Lebanon, "Hezbollah", announced today, Thursday, that it had bombarded the occupied city of Safed with 80 rockets. A statement by the resistance said: "In support of our steadfast Palestinian people in the Gaza Strip, in support of their valiant and honourable resistance, in defense of Lebanon and its people, and response to the barbaric Zionist invasion of cities, villages and civilians, the Islamic Resistance fighters bombed the occupied city of Safed today, Thursday 9/26/2024, with eighty rockets."
